components.title: About me
components.about: My name is Magdalena. Welcome to my CV page made in ReactJS/ TypeScript.

components.title: Objective
components.objective: Over 9 years of experience in quality control in FMCG industry, where the advantages were analytical thinking, inquisitiveness and conscientiousness. Highly motivated, open-minded person. For last months intensively improved skills of web design, web development and learned software testing fundamentals. Currently I am looking for the new opportunities.

components.title: Experience
responsibilities: Performed and documented chemical analysis of raw materials, reported results with SAP
Performed implementation and validation of analytical methods
Created and updated internal standard operation procedures, instructions and guides
Participated in OOS results investigations, determined root causes and corrective actions
Developed calibrations and configured routine measurement applications in chemometric software suite
earnedSkills: Lean management tools in practice - problem solving, 5Why, Ishikawa Diagram
Working with big database in chemometric software

components.title: Skills
skills: English B2 with ACERT academic certificate
